title: Testing
body: This is just to refresh my level so it updates to level 5 so I can post.

replies.body: You can post on your NA account, but the prizes are for OCE only. It's not going to do you much good to get RP on a throwaway account.
I can't ask them to instead send the prize to my NA account?

The rules description didn't sound like it, it's for the OCE community; 

> -Submissions must be submitted using the OCE boards in the appropriate sub-board. This process will be detailed further down. This does mean that you must have an Oceanic League of Legends account to claim your prize.
Sigh. Well then how can I even enter using this OCE account if its still level one several weeks after I hit five? This doesn't seem very fair.

> [{quoted}](name=GreatClockwyrm,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=HXNueXq1,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-05T17:20:21.868+0000)
>
> Sigh. Well then how can I even enter using this OCE account if its still level one several weeks after I hit five? This doesn't seem very fair.

Your account now shows as level 5.
